file info.description: Globals - keys / values that are the same at all sites
file info.file format: JSON standard with variables in unnamed base dictionary (JSON: Object)
file info.use format: This file is loaded into the base dictionary
file info.note: The keys 'site' and 'secret' are invalid are removed before applying template. Bias should be to hard-code these values in templates or make them site specific.

someVar: Every site gets access to this variable!
